author: cms-sw
body:
This updates https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3865 with a change to bring a declaration https://github.com/mrodozov/fastjet/commit/acfff3bf99b6c754efe3768b81393935f3b9a05d so that we apply only the final changes in cms-externals/fastjet (eventually)
@rappoccio , @smuzaffar
title: Bring python support for fastjet
